title: Deck the Halls
description: Fa-la-la-la-la, la-la-la-la! Sing along with a merry family of mice as they prepare for Christmas and two very special guests! The classic carol is brought to life with charming illustrations full of homey details.The soft padded covers, rounded corners and sturdy board pages is a perfect fit for preschoolers!
author: Veronica Vasylenko
